name: Evil Mutant Ninja Aliens From Space
name_original: Evil Mutant Ninja Aliens From Space
description:
A Bullet Hell game with different tight short levels. Clear all the aliens on the screen before the 10 seconds time limit, and face the Boss on the 10th level.

Controls:

  • GamePad (recommended): 
    • Move: Left stick
    • Shoot: Right Trigger or Left button (XBox's X, PlayStation's Square, Switch's Y)
    • Move Slower: Left Trigger
  • Keyboard: 
    • Move: Arrow keys or WASD
    • Shoot: Space
    • Move Slower: Left Shift
    • Start: Enter

Made for the Bullet Hell game jam, with the theme "10 seconds".
